content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">  <ShortName>UNdata</ShortName>  <Description>Search all of the databases contained in UNdata.</Description>  <Url type="text/html" method="get" template="http://data.un.org/Search.aspx?q={searchTerms}"/>  <Image width="16" height="16">http://data.un.org/_Images/favicon.ico</Image>  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>  <SearchForm>http://data.un.org/</SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
